bad: Upstream: Could not find version on github

about.description:
The Soapy Pluto SDR project provides a plugin module to use the Pluto SDR device
within the SoapySDR API and software that supports SoapySDR.

name: soapysdr-module-plutosdr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "soapysdr-module-plutosdr" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/pothosware/SoapyPlutoSDR/archive/soapy-plutosdr-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 263f48be65765f8b9f94ea1125d8e9ca1d8a428835fee5aac19cf4ef8182b52a

build:
  number: 0
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('soapysdr-module-plutosdr', max_pin='x.x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make  # [not win]
    - ninja  # [win]
  host:
    - libad9361-iio
    - libiio
    - soapysdr

test:
  commands:
    # verify that libraries get installed
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/SoapySDR/modules0.7/libPlutoSDRSupport.so  # [not win]
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\SoapySDR\\modules0.7\\PlutoSDRSupport.dll exit 1  # [win]

    # show info to see if module is detected
    - SoapySDRUtil --info

about:
  home: https://github.com/pothosware/SoapyPlutoSDR/wiki
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Soapy SDR plugin for PlutoSDR'
  description: |
    The Soapy Pluto SDR project provides a plugin module to use the Pluto SDR device
    within the SoapySDR API and software that supports SoapySDR.
  doc_url: https://github.com/pothosware/SoapyPlutoSDR/wiki
  dev_url: https://github.com/pothosware/SoapyPlutoSDR

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ryanvolz
